Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Gynecology \Gyn`e*col"o*gy\ (j[i^]n`[-e]*k[o^]l"[-o]*j[y^] or g[imac]`n[-e]-), n. [Gr. gynh`, gynaiko`s, a woman + -logy.] The science which treats of the structure and diseases of women. -- {Gyn`e*col"o*gist}. [1913 Webster]
gynecology n : the branch of medicine that deals with the diseases and hygiene of women [syn: {gynaecology}]
